snippet: Tony Martin broke away to win the second stage of the Tour of Basque Country, and the overall leader, Alberto Contador, maintained his 14-second advantage over Alejandro Valverde.
abstract: Tony Martin wins second stage of the Tour of Basque Country, as Alberto Contador maintains overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Tony Martin broke away to win the second stage of the Tour of Basque Country, and the overall leader, Alberto Contador, maintained his 14-second advantage over Alejandro Valverde.

headline.main: Contador Loses Stage but Retains Lead

keywords.value: Tour of the Basque Country (Bicycle Race)
